showDetails.Nominated For: Oscar in 1991 for Best Music: John Williams; Golden Globe for Best Motion Picture: Comedy/Musical, Best Performance by an Actor: Macaulay Culkin.
showDetails.Trivia: Joe Pesci's character, Harry Lime, is named after Orson Welles's character from the film The Third Man (1949).
showDetails.Followed By: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
showDetails.Cast: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Roberts Blossom
showDetails.Show Description: Its Christmas holidays and Kevin's (Macaulay Culkin) family have plans to go to France. The large extended family has many kids and unfortunately for Kevin and his parents, he is left behind in the rush to get to the airport. Kevin manages to fend for himself despite missing his parents badly. Soon, Harry (Joe Pesci) and Marv (Daniel Stern), two burglars on the lookout for empty homes to rob, turn up in the locality. Watch the hilarious turn of events when Kevin uses childish pranks to keep themen out of his home.

listOfShows.showTitle: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid

showDetails.Also Known As: Anaconda 2: The Black Orchid USA (working title)
showDetails.Produced By: Acobus Rose, Verna Harrah, Susan Ruskin
showDetails.Trivia: The First Hollywood movie to have its premiere in Fiji.
showDetails.Cast: Johnny Messner, KaDee Strickland, Matthew Marsden, Morris Chestnut, Karl Yune
showDetails.Show Description: A group of scientists go on an expedition to Borneo in search of the rare Blood Orchid. Research says that the flower has the power of increasing the life expectations in human beings. A very reluctant Captain Bill Johnson (Johnny Messner) and his partner Tran (Karl Yune) agree to take the research party into the wild for a cost of US$50,000. But on reaching the place they find deadly anacondas that are bigger, faster and more cunning, all thanks to the Blood Orchid. Watch the film to find outwhether the scientists and their guides are able to complete their expedition successfully and get out of the place alive.

showDetails.Cast: Steve Austin, Dolph Lundgren, Eric Keenleyside, Mike Dopud, John Novak
showDetails.Show Description: All Tommy Wick has to do is deliver a "Package" to a rival crime lord, nicknamed 'The German'. It seems like a routine job, until another gang tries to hijack the precious cargo and Tommy has to fight every inch of the way to deliver it safely. The problem is, the "Package" isn't what Tommy was led to believe, and now he's in even deeper than he ever thought possible.
It's a series featuring film based program.

showDetails.Trivia: The original title of the script was "The Last First Kiss".
showDetails.Produced By: James Lassiter, Will Smith, Teddy Zee
showDetails.Cast: Will Smith, Eva Mendes, Kevin James, Amber Valletta, Julie Ann Emery
showDetails.Show Description: Can NYC legendary 'Date doctor' Alex Hitches (Will Smith) help himself to win the woman of his dreams, Sara (Eva Mendes), a gossip columnist , who is out to exploit him and his clients?

showDetails.Trivia: Kate Hudson was pregnant during part of the filming. In the scene at the end of the film, she subconsciously touches her midriff as she walks.
showDetails.Cast: Kate Hudson, John Corbett, Joan Cusack, Hayden Panettiere, Spencer Breslin, Abigail Breslin
showDetails.Show Description: Helen (Kate Hudson) is living the stuff of dreams at the top of her career with a modelling agency. She is busy with fashion shows during the day and partying nights. But all this comes to a full stop when she finds herself in charge of her sister's kids â€“ Audrey, 15 (Hayden Panettiere), Henry, 10 (Spencer Breslin) and Sarah, 5 (Abigail Breslin). The glamorous model now juggles her career along with mothering of three children. Will Helen be able to manage?

showDetails.Trivia: The first John Lasseter-directed Pixar film not to have a score by Randy Newman.
showDetails.Voices: Larry the Cable Guy (Mater), Owen Wilson (Lightning McQueen), Michael Caine (Finn McMissile), Emily Mortimer (Holley Shiftwell), Eddie Izzard (Sir Miles Axlerod)
showDetails.Written By: Ben Queen, John Lasseter, Brad Lewis
showDetails.Repeats on:: Fri, Aug 08 8:00AM Sat, Aug 09 2:00AM Sun, Aug 10 7:30AM
showDetails.Show Description: After Mater gets his best friend, star race car Lightning McQueen, a spot in the very first World Grand Prix, he is given the job of pit crew chief. But while they are in Japan, Mater crosses paths with Holly Shiftwell, a spy searching for an American spy. Unknown to Mater, the American spy attached a tracking device on him while being attacked. Thinking the tow truck is the spy, Holly and another spy, Finn McMissile, take Mater around the world to find and stop an evil plot created by "lemons," old cars considered ugly.

showDetails.Trivia: Actress Brandon Merrill, who plays Jackie Chan's horse-riding Native American wife, is a real-life rodeo champion.
showDetails.Produced By: Gary Barber, Roger Birnbaum, Jonathan Glickman
showDetails.Repeats on:: Sun, Aug 03 5:30AM Mon, Aug 04 9:00PM Wed, Aug 06 2:00AM
showDetails.Cast: Jackie Chan, Owen Wilson, Lucy Liu, Brandon Merrill, Roger Yuan
showDetails.Show Description: In this Western film based in the 19th century, Chon Wang (Jackie Chan) is a blubbering Imperial Guard to the Chinese Emperor. Princess Pei Pei (Lucy Liu) gets kidnapped and Wang feels personally responsible. He goes along with the guards in search of the Princess, who is being held in the USA. On the trail of the abductors, in Nevada, Wang is separated from the rest of the men. He meets Roy (Owen Wilson), a small time thief who is enamoured by grandeur. They strike a partnership that leads them into one misadventure after another.

An outbreak of the T-virus that is initiated in Raccoon city, the whole world is shaken and there are very few survivors left. A large number of flesh-eating zombies crowd the streets. The humans who are leftover, fight to survive. Alice (Milla Jovovich) travels alone on her motorbike through the Nevada Desert. She meets a group of survivors led by Claire (Ali Larter) and Carlos (Oded Fehr) and helps them fight a number of zombie-crows. The evil Dr. Isaacs (Iain Glen) is researching an anti-virus to domesticate the zombies and make Alice clones to cure the infected people. Will his plans work?
showDetails.Cast: Milla Jovovich, Oded Fehr, Ali Larter, Ashanti Douglas, Iain Glen, Matthew Marsden
showDetails.Produced By: Paul Anderson, Jeremy Bolt, Robert Kulzer
showDetails.Trivia: Raccoon City is clearly Detroit, Michigan from the graphic about 6-7 minutes into the film. The Detroit river and Belle Isle are clearly discernible, as is the half moon shaped industrial park to the North (towards the left in the film).

showDetails.Nominated For: Oscar in 1991 for Best Music: John Williams; Golden Globe for Best Motion Picture: Comedy/Musical, Best Performance by an Actor: Macaulay Culkin.
showDetails.Trivia: Joe Pesci's character, Harry Lime, is named after Orson Welles's character from the film The Third Man (1949).
showDetails.Followed By: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York

showDetails.Show Description: Its Christmas holidays and Kevin's (Macaulay Culkin) family have plans to go to France. The large extended family has many kids and unfortunately for Kevin and his parents, he is left behind in the rush to get to the airport. Kevin manages to fend for himself despite missing his parents badly. Soon, Harry (Joe Pesci) and Marv (Daniel Stern), two burglars on the lookout for empty homes to rob, turn up in the locality. Watch the hilarious turn of events when Kevin uses childish pranks to keep themen out of his home.

showDetails.Trivia: Mr. Bean's first name is revealed to be Rowan as seen in a quick glance of his passport.
showDetails.Produced By: Peter Bennet-Jones, Tim Bevan, Eric Fellner
showDetails.Cast: Rowan Atkinson, Emma de Caunes, Willem Dafoe, Jean Rochefort, Max Baldry
showDetails.Show Description: After getting tired of London's weather, Bean packs up his suitcase and heads off to France for some sun on the beach with a new digital camera. Soon he gets into a series of unpleasant situations. Firstly he is convinced to eat bizarre varieties of seafood which he has never seen before. Then he discovers that the train in which he is travelling "Very Fast Train" certainly lives up to its name. Then he stumbles onto the French Riviera and spoils the latest movie production of snobbish, filmmaker Carson Clay (Willem Dafoe). But, he didn't realize that his own video footage will accidentally end up in Clay's film and be screened at the upcoming Cannes Film Festival.

listOfShows.showTitle: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid

showDetails.Also Known As: Anaconda 2: The Black Orchid USA (working title)
showDetails.Produced By: Acobus Rose, Verna Harrah, Susan Ruskin
showDetails.Trivia: The First Hollywood movie to have its premiere in Fiji.
showDetails.Cast: Johnny Messner, KaDee Strickland, Matthew Marsden, Morris Chestnut, Karl Yune
showDetails.Show Description: A group of scientists go on an expedition to Borneo in search of the rare Blood Orchid. Research says that the flower has the power of increasing the life expectations in human beings. A very reluctant Captain Bill Johnson (Johnny Messner) and his partner Tran (Karl Yune) agree to take the research party into the wild for a cost of US$50,000. But on reaching the place they find deadly anacondas that are bigger, faster and more cunning, all thanks to the Blood Orchid. Watch the film to find outwhether the scientists and their guides are able to complete their expedition successfully and get out of the place alive.

showDetails.Produced By: Michael Bay, Andrew Form, Brad Fuller
showDetails.Trivia: When Rabbi Sendak opens the Hebrew book in his office, he thumbs through it in the wrong direction. Hebrew is written in the opposite direction to English; a real rabbi would have opened the book and read it from right to left.
showDetails.Cast: Odette Yustman, Gary Oldman, Cam Gigandet, Meagan Good, James Remar, Rhys Coiro
showDetails.Show Description: Casey Bell hated her mother for leaving her as a child. But when inexplicable things start to happen, Casey begins to understand why she left. Plagued by merciless dreams and a tortured ghost that haunts her waking hours, she must turn to the only spiritual advisor, Sendak, who can make it stop. With Sendak's help, Casey uncovers the source of a family curse dating back to Nazi Germany - a creature with the ability to inhabit anyone or anything that is getting stronger with each possession. With the curse unleashed, her only chance at survival is to shut a doorway from beyond our world that has been pried open by someone who was never born.

Former cop Brian O'Conner partners with ex-con Dom Toretto on the opposite side of the law. Since Brian and Mia Toretto broke Dom out of custody, they've blown across many borders to elude authorities. Now backed into a corner in Rio de Janeiro, they must pull one last job in order to gain their freedom. As they assemble their elite team of top racers, the unlikely allies know their only shot of getting out for good means confronting the corrupt businessman who wants them dead. But he's not theonly one on their tail. Hard-nosed federal agent Luke Hobbs never misses his target. When he is assigned to track down Dom and Brian, he and his strike team launch an all-out assault to capture them. But as his men tear through Brazil, Hobbs learns he can't separate the good guys from the bad. Now, he must rely on his instincts to corner his prey... before someone else runs them down first.
showDetails.Cast: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Jordana Brewster, Dwayne Johnson, Tyrese Gibson, Ludacris
showDetails.Produced By: Vin Diesel, Michael Fottrell, Neal H. Moritz
showDetails.Trivia: The stunt involving the flatbed truck slamming into the moving train was filmed practically without the use of miniatures or CGI. The collision nearly derailed the train, as can clearly be seen.
